DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study demonstrate current successful fulltime daily wear soft contact lens wearer use competitive multi-purpose solution note improve comfort use OPTI-FREE RepleniSH® .
DOC.brief_title: A Multi‐Center Investigation Patient Acceptability OPTI‐FREE RepleniSH® Multi-Purpose Disinfecting Solution ( MPDS )
DOC.criteria: 1 . Participants must 18 65 year age . 2 . Must wear daily wear soft contact lenses minimum 8 hour per day,7 day week . 3 . Must wear plan replacement soft lens 2 week monthly replacement modality . 4 . Must use either COMPLETE MultiPurpose Solution ( MPS ) Easy Rub ReNu MultiPlus brand solution least 30 continuous day prior enrollment . 5 . Must free contact lensrelated symptom regard comfort vision throughout wear hour prior enrollment , exception endofday dryness limit day wear . 6 . Must best correct distance visual acuity , contact lens , 20/30 good eye . 7 . Must willing maintain preenrollment systemic medication regimen study . 8 . Must willing use topical medication rewetting drop 30 day clinical trial duration . 9 . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . 1 . Has use topical medication rewetting drop 7 day prior enrollment . 2 . Achieves best visual correction monovision . 3 . Has modify systemic medication within 30 day prior enrollment . 4 . Has switch brand cosmetic 30 day prior study . 5 . Has history allergy study product ingredient . 6 . Is unwilling unable meet study visit timeline . 7 . Has active corneal , eyelid anterior segment inflammation infection , , opinion Investigator , would adversely affect successful contact lens wear . 8 . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
